messages.title: USE BOTH VOTES TO PUT RECOVERY FIRST

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Votes in parliament to improve education and support teachers.
Support for businesses, more testing, faster vaccinations, care home visiting and support for parents of newborns.

issues.education: Votes in parliament to improve education and support teachers.
issues.health: Extra funding for mental health, education and businesses.

endorsements.endorsement: The Scottish Lib Dems won some big victories this year, getting more investment in education, extra money for mental health and more support for our children in school. We need more Liberal Democrats in the Scottish Parliament, that's why they're getting my vote.

quotes.text: The Lib Dems have secured enhanced funding for education, mental health and local government.

images.caption: Group of people holding Scottish Liberal Democrats signs.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet outlines the achievements delivered by the Scottish Liberal Democrats, such as securing funds for education and mental health, and highlights the key message to use both votes to put recovery first.
